question: Which body has stated that Physics, Chemistry and Maths will not be mandatory for admission to Engineering courses?
explanation:
In line with the principles of New Education Policy (NEP) AICTE has stated that Physics, Chemistry and Maths will not be mandatory for admission in Engineering courses.
AICTE has stated that these subjects will continue to be important engineering courses but students who opt for Biotechnology, Textile or Agriculture Engineering etc will have an option not to study Maths, Physics and Chemistry in Engineering.
